评论详情: I ordered this for a themed event.  It is great.  Fits nice and colors were vibrant.  I used a vinegar soak because fabric still a bit stiff after first wash.
I love butterflies and this dress beautiful all the colors and the material of the dress high quality and the pockets give it more life. I love this dress. And tht 50th look I’m rocking…
Everyone liked it.  Does need ironing
My granddaughter is very tiny and the small fit beautifully. She loved it!!

评论概述: Great quality material/had to get a smaller size
评论详情: 5' 2 1/2" 111.5lbs BUTTERYFLY just as beautiful as I imagined. The colors of the butterflies are bold and true to color as the picture. The fabric is the best quality I've ever had on my body. That said... A butterfly belt is black at works with my try on. It would add to the beauty of the dress if the belt buckle had a butterfly on the black belt. Though it being black works wonders for the look. I followed the size chart and got a medium. I am new to women's sizes so I got the medium. It came almost to my ankles add the top is definitely for um, bigger chested women🤷‍♀️ I did reorder in a small size, not knowing it this would shrink a little when I washed it with the % of cotton. I'm giving it a 5 because it is beautiful great material and true to the 50's look. If the small doesn't work out, I'll go back to the teen sizes, but probably won't find anything this beautiful. ❤️🦋🦋🦋
Very coarse fabric. Also stiff.

评论概述: Waist is very high and pockets are uncomforable
评论详情: The item fit well and could have been flattering...but the waistline may have been made for a shorter person.  I am 5 foot 10 and the waist fell right under my bust. This would place the belt that I did not remove from the wrapper right under my breasts and possibly it would have been hidden. It was hard to get my hands in the pockets because they are at the dresses waistline(so fully bending my arms to try to angle them in).  It could have been a win had the maker dropped the waist to a natural position.  True to size and looked like durable material.

评论概述: Nice but rather large and belt missing
评论详情: I like the print and the fabric, but it turned out to be rather large plus the belt was missing.

I really wanted to love this dress but I'm not sure if I just got a terribly cut version or what but this was the most unflattering dress I've EVER tried on. The waist was in the middle of my boob and I'm not even a tall person. Overall the dress looked terrible on. Wish it would have worked out.

I loved the fit. Received many compliments when I wore it. But after wearing it one time at an outdoor party, the belt (that came with the dress) stained the dress all the way around wear I had sweated (welcome to Texas spring, y'all!) Hoping the double circumference stain comes out in the wash!
I like the design and style of the dress, but the fabric is not as soft as I liked it.
The dress fit according to the chart measurements and the material was good quality.  The dress is even more beautiful in person.  I received many compliments.

I got this to wear to the Arkansas Derby and it was spot on!  I am 5’ 10” and 240 with a large chest.  I had no trouble having it zipped.  The material is firm and held the ironing and starch even through packing and a plane ride.  I paired it with a sheer shrug so I could hide some arm fat but could have gotten away with it alone.  One great feature is that you don’t have to worry about your tummy since it flares out really high.  You could hide a pregnancy in this if ya wanted!  I highly recommend it!
I love the design and material choices

People have stopped me to tell me how much they like my dress. Fits perfectly and feels great in Florida weather. It does not have to be ironed when I take it out of the dryer. And it came with a removable belt :)
This dress is very big

I ordered the Butterfly Dress in a small and it fits perfect. I absolutely love it. It is my favorite dress I have ever ordered

The dress fits, and it is thick. Biggest thing that does bug me though is that the waistline is higher on plus size then regular sizes. My friend has the same dress in regular size and the waistline is at the waistline. For my dress the waistline is higher on my ribs, which makes me look a bit shorter. I'm 5'7 and would like to look it. I will keep it and wear it but it will bug me. Us plus size ladies have normal length waistlines too
Dress is as shown and just needs a quick steam to wear out!

Fits perfect and I love the pockets, the way it feels, the length!!

Nice fit. I’m size 12 and a medium was perfect. Love a dress with pockets and cotton is nice and cool for summer.

评论概述: I'm 5'6 and my bust is a 32, my waist is very small and my hips are very wide.
评论详情: My husband bought me this dress and I'm going to have to return it. I ordered a small, but the bus is just simply too big and the waist has at least two inches of gap, I am sad, because this really is a very beautiful dress. The version that my husband had bought for me was the one with the butterflies and flowers all over it. It did come with a little belt to try to cinch the waist more but it's just not working out.  Overall there's nothing really innately wrong with the dress It's just I need a much smaller size and the company doesn't provide that which is understandable.
I love the dress style and pattern. It’s fun to wear. The material is a little stiff.

The cut of this dress would work best for a petite lady unless your shape and preference is for a short torso fit. I'm 5'6" and it just was off. I do not have a short torso. The other issue was that the fabric was awesome, very good quality and a good weight but in an attempt to save fabric they did not do anything to try and match the print for the front chest seam or at least make it look asthetically pleasing. Even if it had fit ok this would've be a problem. Returned it based on preferences and my body type, but the quality is amazing and the size was true. I'm 5'6" 158 and ordered a M.
I wore this dress Easter, to my sister's Baby Shower and for just because. Light dress,no seeing through,if your chest is larger go up one size so you fit comfortably! Love it! And it has pockets!
Fits a little big on me, maybe I’m just really bad at taking my measurements. But it is beautiful!

I bought this dress to wear to a wedding. I was pleasantly surprised when I received it. The fabric and quality was great and I loved the cut. It was comfortable and a good quality cotton. I ordered one size up and glad I did because it fit perfectly. Beautiful dress!!

This dress was exactly what I was looking for. It fit a tad snug but was still comfortable to wear. I love the flow of this dress and my daughter loves when I "twirl" in this dress. The craftmanship was impeccable. I will definitely be purchasing more dresses!

评论概述: Surprisingly good fit for a petite frame
评论详情: I'm 5' 105 lb and was pleasantly surprised that the S fits me pretty well. It hits at about mid-calf, and there's maybe an inch of extra room in the waist and bust. My only complaint is that the fabric is somewhat coarse and easily wrinkled. The pattern is adorable, and I'm glad I took a chance on this dress.
Love this dress so much, I’m going to purchase another in a different color. The fit was just right!
My wife spent an hour trying to soothe out all the wrinkles, and it’s still wrinkly. She thinks it is cute but is very unhappy with the wrinkles.

I was looking for a vintage style dress for a Derby party and fell in love with this one. I was so surprised when I received it! The quality belongs at a much higher price point plus it has pockets. Worthy of six stars!

Fit my bust well but hips..not so much.  The material is super weird. It kinda feels like canvas. When I had it on it kept the folded shape rather than falling down. It looked super awkward and unappealing.
The photos are exactly like what you get the dress has limited stretch to it. If you have a large chest and wide back order with caution. Other than that the dress is beautiful and well made
Love the vintage feel of the dress and it is well made. It was super comfortable to wear and I got tons of compliments on it
It's wonderful but the chest was ever so slightly too big for me while the waist fit perfectly... so I can't size down. Otherwise this is fantastic... for someone else.

评论概述: Ordered a medium and it fits perfectly Size 8-10
评论详情: Looking forward to wearing it to a Halloween party

Great dress, great quality, love the full skirt! I didn’t even have to wear a petticoat to get the fullness I wanted. I wore this dress for a birthday photoshoot and then out to lunch afterwards. Comfortable and stylish… so many compliments! Truthfully I love all belle poque dresses. You can dress them up or down and feel comfortable as well. O! And did I mention this dress has pockets?! Who doesn’t love a great dress with pockets?

I loved the style of this dress. I bought 1 size up because of my large bust. Good thing I did!! The bodice was form fitting and fir my busy and shoulders without being too large. The skirt was a bit too long for me as well as having a bit too much width for my taste. I could easily fix those small complaints with a few minutes of sewing. Over all I really liked the dress and I received several compliments 👍

Tag inside dress says do not iron. It wrinkles like crazy after washing! Used a low setting to improve it some but needs more heat. I’m afraid to increase the heat as it says not to iron. Also…supposed to have belt but did not come with one. Very disappointing. A very cute dress. My daughter wanted it for her engagement photo shoot.
I wore this for my daughter’s graduation. It’s super comfortable and soft. I have now worn it several times for other events too. It’s one of my favorites

I absolutely loved the pattern and quality of the dress. Unfortunately I had to return the dress because the fit wasn't right for my body. I have larger ribs and it didn't sit right on them. If you get this dress, be sure to wear a petticoat under it for the material to flow better. The dress also has a little stretch to it which makes it more comfortable to move around in.
I think I got a 2xl I love this dress it makes me feel like a princess lol
it's a very flattering dress, it's adorable, but the material is very stiff, and the wrinkles are hard to remove entirely.

This dress fits very well. I’m 5’5” and 165lbs, about 36B bust and I got a Large size in two different styles. The ivory with flowers and butterflies is so cute, but at the center seam on the bodice is a part of one of the butterflies but it looks like there’s a spot on the dress. It’s highly conspicuous and not in a place where I can readily cover it with anything. So I’ve l been reluctant to wear this out, so even though it fits well, it’s seems as though it was a waste of money because I’m not confident in wearing this dress anywhere due to the mid placement of the pattern. I also bought this (similar) dress in a check pattern (the one with straps and decorative covered buttons down the front) and it looks beautiful on, also with the same good fit, with no pattern issues. Basically, the butterfly flower patterned dress will be a hit or Miss for anyone because pattern placement will vary.
I love this dress! The fabric, the fit, everything

评论概述: Odd neckline to shoulder seem ratio.
评论详情: Dress fit fine everywhere, except the neckline....well it would have  if my boobs sit where my collar bone is. I even got the xxl because I'm broad shouldered.  The V in the neckline opening, which should have been down around my mid-sternum, was up at my collarbone/throat due to the short ratio of fabric from the vline to the shoulder seems.  Fortunately I am skilled enough with a sewing machine and i am going to open the shoulder seams and add some lace/coordinating fabric to give it the length it needs so it works. Either that or I will just detach the top from the bottom and have a great swingy skirt for summer

评论概述: Beautiful dress; I ordered a size down

I ordered a large based on the sizing chart and I was absolutely swimming in it. Exchanged it for a medium which fit perfectly. I will have to control the urge to buy many, many lovely dresses from this company!
I LOVE this dress!  It fits perfect and looks just like the picture and the material is great! I will order more in different colors.

评论概述: Much smaller than the size chart
评论详情: Loved the print and weight of the material however; I purchased it based on the manufacture’s size chart and the mid to upper back and chest would not fit at all. The waist, hips, and lower back fit just fine (even with some breathing room). I would recommend not purchasing the size specified and go up a size, if possible.

I got the butterfly pattern, when I tried it on, the right pocket was sewn in backwards. The bust of the dress was sewn so high not even Dolly Parton could've contorted to make it fit. The belt didn't have anything to hold the tail so it just kinda flapped in the wind. Very unflattering fit, as my boobs were trapped in the bodice of the dress and the fabric of the bust was just hanging there above them. Not worth it.

This dress is not true-to-size.  I should've gotten a dress two sizes larger if it had been available.  The butterfly design is very pretty, but the waist seam is very high and looks weird when the dress is on.
I love this dress !
Fit as expected
The length is to long.
wore this dress to a wedding and received endless comments. I loved this dress. And it was very affordable

I originally bought the medium but it was too big so I returned and got the small. Fits amazing and is super cute.  The belt it comes with feels cheap, is super long, and gets in my way as I have to wear it pretty tight so I’ll not be using it. I will replace it with one of my own or maybe a cute fabric ribbon.  The butterfly platter is very cute. The fabric is more cream than white which is fine for me but it’s shear so either wear light colored under garments or a slip. If you want this to look like the pictures you will need a petticoat to add a little lift to the skirts otherwise it is just like a sundress.  My zipper gets a little stuck on the fabric but that only happened with the small size(didn’t happen with the medium) so I think the zipper may just be defective. Stitching is good and there are no loose threads on either of the dresses. The dress does arrive folded in a bag so it is wrinkled. After hanging it up for a few days the wrinkles didn’t fall out so will probably need light ironing to smooth it and maintain the pleats.

The dress is everything! If you thinking about it get it. The fit is flattering. The fabric is comfy. It came with a cute little belt. I got the white butterfly one and its gorgeous. The length is just below my knee and Im 6 feet tall. Nothing I can say bad about this. I love the top portion also. The V neck is very flattering. Sexy but not all out there.
I took it out from the package, to try it on but it was already broken and like someone tried to fixed it but they couldn't and that rip the fabric. Really desapointed!

Absolutely adorable! The fabric is very slightly stretchy and a decent thickness. I am 5’4, 125 pounds and a C cup. The top was a tiny bit snug but I was able to get it zipped and it looked so cute I decided to keep it. Might want to order a size up if your big busted.

It fits very well, I'm 5'4 182lbs 36C, 30, 40, and I ordered a Large. The fabric is more cotton feeling than synthetic, so it has very little give. I love that it has pockets!!  Also, no need for a slip, it is not sheer or dee through! Definitely a great buy!

I loved this dress, from the pattern to the cut (plus it came with a belt, which was nice). For reference, I am 5'6", about 155 lbs, and a B-cup (36" around). The Medium fit me well overall, although it was a little tight around the stomach/torso (I think that has less to do with the dress and more to do with medication-induced bloating), but it is still flattering. The material has a little bit of stretch to it and is of a decent quality (not too thin). I like the way it fits and moves, and felt pretty again while wearing it.

This fits amazingly well, is comfortable and super flattering. I'm curvy, with a round belly, and this looks absolutely perfect. The shape accentuates the waist, shows off your curves, and looks great with or without a crinoline.

Great dress just really big in the chest area and didnt have anytime to alter it before my friends wedding so had to put multiple bras on under it so it would some what fit better there . Other than that the dress is great and so beautiful.

The bodice is fitted so order according to your bust size.  If you are large busted you might consider a different style. I’m a solid size 10 and order a large based on the size chart and it fits me well.
